text:
Created attachment 35548
text file with raw HTTP request

It seems that by using a very long POST parameter request, it is possibly to make the server fill all available memory, then it will just error out with "[proxy_fcgi:error] (12)Cannot allocate memory : Error dispatching request to : (passing brigade to output filters)

attached is an example packet.

Please have a look at https://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.4/mod/core.html#limitrequestbody and all other configuration directives there where you can protect your server against such attacks.

I will close this issue, but if you have a case where an exploit is possible inspite of such a configuration, please feel free to reopen this.
